casebody.data:
LITTLE SISTERS OF THE POOR HOME FOR THE AGED, DENVER, COLORADO, et al., petitioners,
v.
Sylvia BURWELL, Secretary of Health and Human Services, et al. No. 15-105. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 6, 2015.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted limited to Questions 1 and 2 presented by the petition. The case is consolidated.
